MR No. 870 - Keeping the Sabbath in our Sanitariums

     [Matthew 5:17-19 quoted.] 
     It is our work to give this message. We are to teach men and women not to regard lightly one principle of the law of God. By precept and example we are to explain the nature of God's holy requirements. Thus we shall be in the world a savor of life unto life.
